ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New colors pretty - any good combo's?
ygData.msgSnippet: Adres Tal also came up with a rather nice color set for Bards that play in the full screen with transparent overlays mode.  It is very nice!  Here s a link to
ygData.messageBody:
Adres Tal also came up with a rather nice color set for Bards that play in
the full screen with transparent overlays mode. It is very nice! Here's a
link to the thread:

http://pub5.ezboard.com/ftheconcerthallbackstage.showMessage?topicID=4592.to
pic

Enjoy!

Lyrnia Jongleur
----- Original Message -----
From: "Donny Dane" <ddane01@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 9:27 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New colors pretty - any good combo's?


> i haven't messed with mine yet (but i AM going to)
>
> here's a good way to do it:
>
> http://eq.castersrealm.com has put together a wizard to let you change the
> colors, and generate a file. You might want to try there to get some idea
> of how to generate what you want.
>
> MacGrough Mich'Rathe
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Cook Miller-ETOP03" <etop03@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 8:17 AM
> Subject: [eqbards] New colors pretty - any good combo's?
>
>
> > With all the hoohah on Abashi's lack of memory and Ester being on
> vacation,
> > no one has mentioned one of the nicer things in the last patch - you can
> > control colors, run and screen mode defaults now. I don't know about
you,
> > but have you ever missed a song because the blue didn't show up well in
> full
> > screen mode? You ever forget to click run and get beat to death as you
> > supposedly selo's to zone? I hate having to always change to full
screen
> > (not much effort, but it does get old). I like what Verant did here and
> > give them credit for it. I just wish... Ah, nevermind, enough said on
> that
> > line already.
> >
> > So, I want to share what I did and see if any of you have had any
success
> > with the color changes. I first made my songs red - I wanted to see
them
> > boldly, but that mixed in with resist so not good. I then changed songs
> to
> > yellow - that shows up really well in all modes. Damage shields (if you
> > still have them on) also show up in yellow, but I typically am not
getting
> > beat on that long even if pulling, so not a problem. I also changed
skill
> > increases to red. I use a parser sure, but I like to see them (or at
> least
> > have a chance - blue sucks imho - I could never catch what was said -
> song,
> > skill or whatever - in blue). Anyone else play with this?
> >
> > Piemur Draggonsinger
> > Bard of the 31st Song
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
> >
>
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
